name: Navigate using in-page menu and sub-menu contents on hover
fullName: features/ui/widget_display_and_menus.feature#Navigate using in-page menu and sub-menu contents on hover

steps.name: I navigate to Demoqa Home page
Given I navigate to the Menu page
When I hover over the main item 2 sub sub list
Then I see my menu sub sub items

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Navigate using in-page menu and sub-menu contents on hover
